description:
****JOIN OVER 600+ STUDENTS IN THE FASTEST GROWING ECOMMERCE COURSE ON UDEMY***

Do any of these apply to you?

- Do you want to build an online store FAST and EASY?

- Do you anticipate your store will grow over time?

- Do you prefer to build an ecommerce store without having to code?

If you're still reading this, we're assuming you answered YES to at least one of the questions above.

Building an ecommerce store doesn't have to be rocket science. We make it easy by walking you step by step through building an ecommerce store. This course is designed 100% to take your idea and turn it into paid orders. Beyond that, you'll learn valuable skills for developing and growing your online store and brand. Our goal is that the ideas you take away from this course will dramatically increase the growth potential of your store.

How does this work?

The course gradually introduces concepts and skills as you need them to walk you through creating your unique online store. Not only are the technical skills taught, but there is also a strong focus on marketing / branding of your store.

Watch and follow along as we build and launch a LIVE online store. Don't believe us? Watch the introduction video to see our store in action!

What Makes Us Different?

A lot of courses are taught by one instructor. In this course, you get two instructors with different view points and skills. One instructor has a focus on making the online store work, while the other focuses on making the store experience flow. We have a combined 10+ years of website development experience with 7+ years of building and launching ecommerce stores. Over the years we have worked with major brands such as American Idol, Tough Mudder Gear, and Price is Right.

Why should you listen to us?

Each week we teach website and eCommerce development techniques to thousands of students on our Code Karate website and our YouTube channel. Our Code Karate YouTube channel has over 6,000 subscribers and over a million views. On top of that, more than 30,000 people visit our Code Karate website each month for our help and guidance.

What will you learn?

  • You will learn how to setup and install Drupal Commerce
  • You will learn about creating and managing products and inventory
  • You will learn about creating discounts and promotions
  • You will learn about managing orders
  • You will learn how to handle the shipping of products and orders
  • You will learn how to accept payments and make money on your eCommerce website
  • You will learn the basics of SEO and marketing of your eCommerce store
  • You will learn how to design a beautiful looking store by pointing and clicking your way to a great online store design

Start your eCommerce Journey

It's time to start your eCommerce Journey... and we are here to help you along the way. Join the growing list of thousands creating eCommerce websites with Drupal Commerce with our help. Sign up for the course today and let's turn your eCommerce dream into a money making reality!
title: Ecommerce success: Building a customized ecommerce store
